root.name: Blackwell Deception
root.description: OverviewThe Blackwell Deception picks up a few years after the events of The Blackwell Convergence. Rosangela Blackwell has started her own business as a "Spiritual Investigator" as she and her spirit guide Joey continue to help lost spirits cross over.PC System RequirementsOS:Windows ME or higherProcessor:Pentium or higherMemory:64 MB RAMGraphics:640x400, 32-bit colour: 700 Mhz system minimumDirectXÂ®:5.0Hard Drive:200 MB HD spaceSound:All DirectX-compatible sound cards
